item.title: Being fat is a trap
item.description:
Federico Pereiro’s Being Fat is a Trap is, I think, a great piece of advice. Way more people than I wish who are close to me are struggling with eating disorders of all kinds, so I’m sensible about the topic.

This sentence, in particular, rings true in an aching way:

Judging people inside the fat trap just intensifies their misery and reduces the odds they can get out of it.
